SELECT n.id, n.title, n.content, n.created_by AS createdBy, n.created_at AS createdAt, n.is_banner AS isBanner, n.images AS imageUrls, COALESCE(nr.is_read, 0) AS isRead FROM notice n LEFT JOIN notice_receiver nr ON n.id = nr.notice_id WHERE n.is_deleted = 0 AND ( nr.user_id = #{userId} ) ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount, SUM(CASE WHEN is_read THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS readCount FROM notice_receiver WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
SELECT* FROM notice WHERE id = #{noticeId} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_receiver SET is_read = 1, read_at = NOW() -- MySQL 使用 NOW(), PostgreSQL 使用 NOW(), Oracle 使用 SYSDATE WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT ur.user_id AS userId, ui.username AS username, ui.phone AS phone FROM notice_receiver ur INNER JOIN user_info ui ON ur.user_id = ui.id WHERE ur.notice_id = #{noticeId} AND ur.is_read = 0 ORDER BY ui.username
